titleStmt.title: The imperial tragedy taken out of a Latin play, and very much altered / by a gentleman ...
titleStmt.author: Killigrew, William, Sir, 1606-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Will. Wells and Rob. Scott ...,

notesStmt.note: Ascribed to Sir William Killigrew. Cf. NUC Pre-1956.

"By a gentlemn for his own diversion, who, on the importunity of friends, has consented to have it published; but without his name: because many do censure plays, according to their opinions of the author."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
